text: Iyesus bík woshetsnton guri abaatse oot't juwanots ned'b́dek', b́ danifwotsitse aywotswere manoke fa'ano botesh, anynwere b́ keewirwo k'eboshat boshodotse kasho geeyat wááts ay dek't ayts ash ashuwotswere fa'ano botesh. Bowere bowóóko Yhud datsatse, Iyerusalem kitotse, aatsk'ari ganoke fa'uwots T'irosnat Sidon kitwotsitsikno botesh.
